infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera to capture photos and videos as proof of service.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to your location to verify you are at the correct property for clock in/out.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to photo library to select images for proof of service.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs access to microphone to record videos as proof of service.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow CPR CRM to access your camera to capture photos and videos as proof of service.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow CPR CRM to use your location to verify you are at the correct property for clock in/out.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow CPR CRM to access your photos to select images for proof of service.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow CPR CRM to save photos to your library.
